body:
argocd plan for `testapp`

```diff

===== apps/Deployment /web ======
0a1,38
> object:
>   apiVersion: apps/v1
>   kind: Deployment
>   metadata:
>     labels:
>       app: web
>       argocd.argoproj.io/instance: helloworld
>       env: staging
>     name: web
>   spec:
>     progressDeadlineSeconds: 600
>     replicas: 1
>     revisionHistoryLimit: 10
>     selector:
>       matchLabels:
>         app: web
>     strategy:
>       rollingUpdate:
>         maxSurge: 25%
>         maxUnavailable: 25%
>       type: RollingUpdate
>     template:
>       metadata:
>         labels:
>           app: web
>       spec:
>         containers:
>         - image: gcr.io/google-samples/hello-app:1.0
>           imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
>           name: hello-app
>           resources: {}
>           terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
>           terminationMessagePolicy: File
>         dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
>         restartPolicy: Always
>         schedulerName: default-scheduler
>         securityContext: {}
>         terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30

```
